Title: The Original Sin
Writer: Kurd E. Heyne, Helmut Käutner, Bobby Todd
Actors: Bobby Todd, Bettina Moissi, Joana Maria Gorvin, Arno Assmann
Plot: An apple juice producer can't decide between his wife and his secretary and tries to commit suicide. Being committed to psychiatry, he falls asleep and dreams of adventures as Adam and Eve in heaven and hell.
